onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.example.c195pa.controller.MainMenuController

onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.example.c195pa.controller.MainMenuController
Verifies the user has selected a customer from the tableView, and deletes the customer only if they have no existing appointments

All text on the login screen is changed to french, to include alerts
onActionLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.example.c195pa.controller.LoginController
When the user clicks the login button, the login and username text boxes are parsed and sent in a query to the database.

onLogoutButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.example.c195pa.controller.MainMenuController
